I'm Ronald McDonald and I just love to see people smile.
I also love to bring out the inner kid in everyone too.
Well, it's not really a job, it's more like play.
Traveling around the world, I see the most incredibly fun things.
As I see it, fun makes great things happen.
When you're having fun, you can't help but smile.
Hey, did you know that a smile may change things for the better.
Smiling can help boost creativity, lift spirits, brighten a room,...
...improve your mood and can even help you make friends.
It might even make the impossible possible.
Fun works wonders and I want fun to bloom and grow everywhere.
So, I want all you fun makers to have a chance to shine.
Here's the idea: seek out fun.
Anytime you see fun make great things happen,...
...hit the record button, make a video or take a picture with your story.
Get in touch and share the fun.
